title: 2.6.1 crashes every 5 seconds

labels.name: Type: Possible bug
labels.description: Issues that seem to be a bug, but haven't been confirmed yet

body:
### Checklist

- [X] I have used the search function for [open](https://github.com/AntennaPod/AntennaPod/issues) **and** [closed](https://github.com/AntennaPod/AntennaPod/issues?q=is%3Aissue+is%3Aclosed) issues to see if someone else has already submitted the same bug report.
- [X] I will describe the problem with as much detail as possible.
- [X] If the bug only to occurs with a certain podcast, I will include the URL of that podcast.

### App version

2.6.1

### Where did you get the app from

F-Droid

### Android version

12 (Stock)

### Device model

Samsung Galaxy Note 10 Lite

### First occurred

On 2.5.2 release

### Steps to reproduce

I believe the problem is specific to my device, seeing as I couldn't find any other reports.
1. Open an app
2. Wait 5 seconds
3. Crash
4. Repeat

### Expected behaviour

No crashes, like on 2.5.1

### Current behaviour

Whenever I open an app it crashes within ~5 seconds, the issue first arose with 2.5.2 release - [video](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/90791307/178727172-bfe7da83-a0c6-4ec8-9dbe-876d19bef300.mp4), and continues with 2.6.1 - [video](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/90791307/178727557-398b9c3b-96fc-475b-860f-95f0d3f73dfa.mp4). No matter what page or podcast is open.
One interesting quirk though is clicking on "Copy to clipboard" in bug report page, which stops the crashes until I go back to main UI.

### Logs

[full-logs.txt](https://github.com/AntennaPod/AntennaPod/files/9101677/full-logs.txt) from 2.6.1
